long_description: Featuring a gray-tinted lens for sunny days, the Oakley A-Frame snow goggles deliver clear optics and a comfortable fit so you can ride all day long. Emerald Iridium lens has a gray tint, 10% visible light transmission (VLT) and a glare-cutting mirror finish, offering neutral contrast and accurate color for sunny days. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment along with frame and lens venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Durable frame is made of a conforming, flexibile plastic to ensure a comfortable fit all day long and in changing temperatures. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the Oakley A-Frame snow goggles fits small- to medium-size faces.
short_description: Featuring a gray-tinted lens for sunny days, the Oakley A-Frame snow goggles deliver clear optics and a comfortable fit so you can ride all day long.
